feed.title: Genesis of Downtown Chicago Inventory Feed

entry.title: 2025 Genesis GV80 Prestige
entry.ns0:description:
The Napleton Auto Group promotes a no pressure buying experience that puts the customer in charge of the buying process, and for over 80 years, the Napleton family has made sure that absolutely nothing is more important than our commitment to your satisfaction. Our staff members are professional in every sense of the word, and receive regular training, including factory certification, so they are truly knowledgeable about the vehicles we offer. We want every customer's experience to be as timely, comfortable and ultimately as satisfying as it possible can be. You'll see it in every department of every Napleton Auto Group dealership. We hope you'll join the thousands of other satisfied customers that buy and service their vehicles the Napleton way. This 2025 Genesis GV80 Prestige offered in Vik Black will make a great addition to your family or business! Be sure to take note of all this vehicle has to offer:

Option Group 01

    Convenience

    • GPS linked cruise control - Set it and forget it. Road trips used to be stressful, until GPS linked cruise control set the pace. Simply set the desired speed and the system uses GPS navigation data to maintain that speed without driver intervention - including slowing down for curves and anticipating hills. This can help minimize driver fatigue and improve overall fuel economy. Meet your ultimate co-pilot; GPS linked cruise control.

    Safety and Security

    • Pedestrian impact prevention - An extra step toward safety. Pedestrians don't always stop, look, and listen, but with Pedestrian Impact Prevention, your vehicle is equipped to better see them and avoid them. This system constantly monitors the road ahead to identify and track pedestrians. It projects that image to an interior display screen, AND should an impact become likely, Pedestrian impact prevention takes steps to avoid a collision.
    • Hands-on cruise control with lane change - Set it and forget it. Road trips used to be stressful. Cruise control only managed speed, but not distance or safety. Now, with hands-on cruise control with lane change, simply set your desired speed and let sensor technology maintain a safe distance between you and surrounding vehicles. It slows you down; speeds you up, and helps you make lane changes. Meet your ultimate co-pilot, hands-on cruise control with lane change.
    • Rear camera - Watching your back! The rear camera helps you see obstacles and hazards you otherwise couldn't by showing enhanced images of what is behind you. The rear camera is an extra set of eyes that's both convenient and safe.

    Technology and Telematics

    • Mobile hotspot - WiFi on the fly. Connect your devices to the Internet through your vehicle's private mobile hotspot and take the internet wherever your journey takes you, without eating up your data allowance. Find the hotspot with mobile hotspot.
    Other notable features: Genesis of Downtown Chicago is proud to serve customers in communities throughout the Chicagoland area. Give us a call at 312-588-9421 or stop by to test drive your new car, truck, or SUV today! 2700 S. Michigan Ave. Chicago IL 60616 Napleton Autos Online Pricing Disclaimer New vehicle inventory is offered for sale at the Manufacturer's Suggested Retail Price (MSRP), as set by Genesis Motor America and/or Genesis Financial. Prices labeled as the "Napleton Price" include all eligible dealer discounts and/or manufacturer incentives and do not include taxes, title, license fees, documentation fees, optional equipment, or dealer-installed accessories selected by the customer at the time of purchase. Destination charges may vary by model and are included in the displayed pricing. All pricing is subject to change without notice based on manufacturer program updates, incentive eligibility, or market conditions. Napleton Autos advertises its inventory on this website, www.napleton.autos, as well as on third-party advertising platforms. Pricing is specific to each vehicle, identified by its Vehicle Identification Number (VIN) and dealer stock number. The pricing shown on www.napleton.autos represents the most current and accurate pricing for Napleton Autos. In the event of any discrepancy between this website and any third-party website, the pricing displayed on www.napleton.autos will be considered the most accurate and will supersede all other advertised prices. While every effort is made to ensure the accuracy of the information on this site, errors may occur. Please verify all information with a Napleton Autos Client Advisor. You may do so by contacting us directly or visiting the dealership.
